subject: How to write the assertion?
msgSnippet: To write test cases with Junit, we have write assertion for the tested method. Then how to write an accurate assertion. Do we have to understand the origin
messageBody:
To write test cases with Junit, we have write assertion for the tested
method. Then how to write an accurate assertion. Do we have to
understand the origin method? If so, then what's the difference between
testers and developers?

I've read some samples of junit. They are easy to think out an
assertion.

But for most methods, how can we decide whether write an assertion with
the original method or assertTrue(/assertFalse)?
Please give me some help on writing the assertion.

Thanks!
